title: Beef Macaroni and Cheese
directions: Heat the oven to 350 degrees F.
Cook the macaroni according to package directions; drain and set aside.
Heat the oil in a skillet; add the ground beef, peppers, onion, and garlic, and saute.
Add the tomatoes, bacon, Rob's basic seasoning, and the basil, cumin, and oregano in a large bowl. Combine the macaroni and the beef mixture.
Spread this mixture into a 9 by 13-inch baking dish.
Top with the cheese and bake for 20 to 25 minutes, or until the cheese is lightly browned and bubbly.
ingredients: 1/2 teaspoon each dried basil, ground cumin, and dried oregano
